item.description:
Remember that you don't have to be good at all at trivia to join us on Trivia nights, we're a casual group and we're there to have fun, learn some new things, and make (or meet with) new friends.

Trivia starts at 7:00 (well, 7:15ish), but we should meet between 6:00 and 6:30 to get good seating. Trivia runs about 2 or so hours, so you won't likely be out before 9:00-9:30, please keep that in mind when RSVPing.

Winning teams are generally only comprised of up to 6 players, so should we exceed that, well, we won't officially win :) But if we have 11 or 12, we may make an attempt to split into 2 teams. Not likely, but possible.

NOTE: Currently, I work until 6:15ish, and so I would not make it until just about 7:00-7:15.  It would be appreciated that whomever gets there first snags a table with sufficient seating.  Table preference for 7 or under is the round table in the corner, more than 7 would be the first set of tables to the right when you walk in.
item.name: Stump Trivia at English Cellar Alehouse 10/30
